_comment2: You choose your clan for the prerelease. Each clan prerelease pack comes with a clan pin and a clan sticker. The prerelease pack further contains 5 regular booster packs, 1 seeded booster pack, 1 premium promo card, 1 activity insert and 1 Spindown life counter. Fate Reforged will feature 40 prerelease cards â€” one dated and stamped prerelease card random from a pool of eight for each Clan pack. One of which will be the Khan.
_comment4: seeded boosters are the same as KTK: promo is one of 40 cards, 8 cards per clan

querySet._comment: Early sets had 1/67 cards as foil, equating to 15/67 (~20%) chance a booster had a foil, and as of TSP it replaces a common.
